alert.note: Alert for Allen; Putnam (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 12:58AM EDT until April 01 at 1:45AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Putnam County in west central Ohio... Northeastern Allen County in west central Ohio... * Until 145 AM EDT. * At 1257 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Weston to near Elida, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Ottawa, Bluffton, Columbus Grove, Leipsic, Pandora, Gilboa, Belmore, Vaughnsville, Rockport and Gomer. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
